#summary checkBox(objectName, property [checkedValue, uncheckedValue, label, wrapLabel, prepend, append, prependToLabel, appendToLabel, errorElement])
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Builds and returns a string containing a checkbox form control based on the supplied property and objectName. Wheels will generate the appropriate name convention for the form control.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *objectName* || string || true ||  || The name of the object (model name) to wrap the property around ||
|| * property* || string || true || || The name of the property (database column) to use in the checkbox ||
|| * checkedValue* || any || false || 1 || The value of the checkbox when is on the state `checked` ||
|| * uncheckedValue* || any || false || 0 || The value of the checkbox when is on the state `unchecked` ||
|| * label* || string || false || || The label to prepend to the checkbox control ||
|| * wrapLabel* || boolean || false || true || Sets whenever to wrap or not the checkbox control inside the label HTML tag ||
|| * prepend* || string || false || || Value to prepend to the checkbox control, useful to wrap the control around HTML tags ||
|| * append* || string || false || || Value to append to the checkbox control, useful to wrap the control around HTML tags ||
|| * prependToLabel* || string || false || || Value to prepend to the checkbox's label, useful to wrap the control around HTML tags ||
|| * appendToLabel* || string || false || || Value to append to the checkbox's label, useful to wrap the control around HTML tags ||
|| * errorElement* || string || false || div || Name of the HTML tag to wrap the checkbox control when the [ObjectValidation object validation] fails ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- view controller code --->
<cfoutput>
  <p>#checkBox(objectName="photo", property="isPublic", label="Is public?")#</p>
</cfoutput>
}}}
